snippet.title: Weird science: venereal diseases picky about circumcision
snippet.description: ...Our first story this weekend isn't science; it's math. There's a new, open access math journal in the works, and it's looking for submissions for its inaugural issue. Nothing surprising there, but its twist on the publishing process is hinted at by its title: Rejecta Mathematica. I'd be tempted to view this as a joke, but there appear to be real academics behind it, and t...
